name: James Patterson's Women's Murder Club: Death in Scarlet
name_original: James Patterson's Women's Murder Club: Death in Scarlet
description:
James Patterson's Women's Murder Club: Death in Scarlet is a puzzle game developed by Floodlight Games. It came out on 15-05-2008. It was published by Oberon Media.
James Patterson's Women's Murder Club: Death in Scarlet is available on PC.
